title: Hybrid Feedback Strategy Design for Distance Design Education

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of design processes and fundamental project management experience
context.additional_context: Online Project-Based Course for Current Practitioners Conducted in a BYOD Environment

learning_goals: Learners acquire the ability to enhance functional and aesthetic elements of design solutions using a blended feedback (audio and text) model.
Learners develop strategies to proactively engage in feedback processes and create unanticipated additional learning opportunities.
Learners recognize emotional responses arising from tutor interactions and understand how to leverage them as motivational tools.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
